radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiloculated cystic mass arising from the tail of the pancreas measuring approximately 5.3 x 4.7 x 4.3 cm with moderate fat stranding adjacent to this lesion. Bibasilar, left greater than right atelectasis mild. No pleural effusion.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased in size from 3.2 x 2 x 2.3 cm previously to 5.3 x 4.7 x 4.3 cm. Moderate fat stranding adjacent to the lesion and pancreatic tail parenchyma is new.
